channel.title: [RS2][SRL]Weibs Power Miner.[SRL][RS2]
channel.description:
I posted this in Runescape Scripts before realizing it should go here, so I'll re-post it here:
Well, I made this for my SRL Application script over at villu-reborn, but I thought I'd post it here to get some suggestions and improve it.
This uses SRL 3.4 and has Anti-Randoms, Anti-Ban, selective dropping ( Only drops ores and dwarf items ) , AutoColor, Multi-Player, fail-safes, etc. Also has a pretty accurate progress report that gives individual player reports.
This script is open to criticism, just try to make it helpful. Please post all bugs you find, suggestions, and please post progress reports!! Right now I have it so that it doesn't clear the debug each report, so that you can see everything that happens.
[u]Known Bugs:[/u]
[ul] [li]Gas only works some of the time :rolleyes:[/li][/ul]
[u]Versions / Changes:[/u] .9 - First Release.
-Weibs.

|

Cr1mson:
Active: True.
Loads Done : 8
Ores Mined : 218
Starting Mining Level: 70
Current Mining Level : 70
-------------------------------------------

Very nice script my friend. The box solver works since I saw that happen. Had some problems on the genie though. But all in all it’s very nice. I escpessially like the anti-ban Oh hi everybody by the way im crimson and i’m new

item.dc:creator: @ry024_sk8ter ry024_sk8ter
item.description:
@ry024_sk8ter wrote:

yea this is pretty good script just gas detection and frog random would nice to work better…or if theres not like 100% chance it will get past frogs you should have it logout and switch to next player if it cant figure random or broken pikax etc… also would it be okay if someone else fixed this script up like fix the things i just stated and also add looping characters like stars ess miner so you can auto like for 2 days str8 and have there lv’s fly up =) cuz its kinda stupid sumtimes and even when you tell it to do 50 loads it will do 2 and logout overall thogh kikass script espescially since its free =)

item.title: [RS2][SRL]Weibs Power Miner.[SRL][RS2]
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Make sure you extract the SRL file into the Scar 2.03 folder. You’ll need winrar to extract it.

boogeymany:

i’m having a problem when i run the script :S i go to mining guild but it dont mine… it make log out :S

This script doesn’t support coal right now. You can’t use it in the mining guild, unless you change the color. If you want some help on doing that, just ask.

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2][SRL]Weibs Power Miner.[SRL][RS2]
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[code]/===========================================
| Thank You For Using Weibs’ PowerMiner!
|===========================================
| Total Ores Mined : 106.
| Total Time Worked : 27 min(s), 55 sec(s).
|
|----------Individual Player Reports--------
|

In Da Hood75:
Active: True.
Loads Done : 4
Ores Mined : 106
Starting Mining Level: 28
Current Mining Level : 29
-------------------------------------------

===========================================[/code]

Very Good, One thing though, The Lost Function, I ended up taking all the Loc(‘Lost’); out because things were making it not find the mining symbol and making me log out after each load, otherwise it would of done 8 loads(cause it took me 4 times to find the reason why it didnt work) other then that I would highly recommend it because it works incredibly well.

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2][SRL]Weibs Power Miner.[SRL][RS2]
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

There’s actually a better way to check to see if the rock has been mined. Apparently, when the rock mined message comes up, a certain pixel turns to 0. Fakawi found it out, but his post got deleted.

About the Loc, lol, that never really occurred to me, I just saw it in another script a long time ago, and I guess I did the same. I’ll change that in the next version. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2][SRL]Weibs Power Miner.[SRL][RS2]
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Very good xD
I especially like how you used InChat(‘manage’); I never thought of that.
Lots of FailSafes, I will try this later =D, I’ll post proggy.

One thing which I suggest, If you dont want them touching the Loc, why not just not include it in the script

Read full topic

I posted this in Runescape Scripts before realizing it should go here, so I’ll re-post it here:
